page.title: 10A VISIT TO THE FARM
page.content: The farm was built in 1954 and it only had 3 buildings then.Les Goodwin was the owner then and still is today,when he is helped by Ray Allsopp.The farm is poultry and arable land.They have two different kinds of animals chickens and pigs.There are 70,000 chickens and 6 pigs.The chickens and pigs are sent to a factory to be killed.The chickens are killed when they are 7 weeks old.Aswell as the livestock,they grow crops like wheat, barley and rape. Les Goodwin looks after the crops and Ray Allsopp the animals. They have 3 new machines which are a corn dryer, a tractor and a machine which catches chickens.There are 5 sheds full of chickens and a shed full of pigs.Les Goodwin lives on the farm and Ray Allsopp lives down the road. BY MICHELLE ALLSOPP & LISA TRASK.
